section.p: ‘Umm, well, I suppose I could let one such as you through,’ says the tree thoughtfully. Then it uproots itself with a great tearing sound, and shuffles out of the way. ‘There you go!’ says the tree, ‘You may pass.’
You walk through the thorn bush gate. Beyond, you find several huge oak trees whose branches are so big that they are able to support the homes of many people. .
